articles.title: Greetings to SWAPO Party
articles.content:
Greetings to SWAPO Party
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, sent a message of greeting to the Central Committee of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party on April 18 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the founding of the SWAPO Party.
					 The message said the WPK Central Committee is rejoiced over many achievements the SWAPO Party has made in the struggle to achieve the independence of the country and build stable and developed, new Namibia over the past 55 years since the founding of the SWAPO Party.
					
					 Expressing belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished the SWAPO Party bigger successes in its future work to strengthen the party and achieve the socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zimbabwean President
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on April 18 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, sincerely wishing the president and people of Zimbabwe greater successes in their work for the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the venue of the 17th Kimilsungia Festival on Saturday.
					 They looked round the festival venue which has turned into a veritable sea of flowers representing boundless reverence of progressive mankind and the Korean people for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 At the end of the visit the chief said:
					
					 I am very impressed to visit the festival venue at a significant time marking the 50th anniversary of the naming of a beautiful flower Kimilsungia.
					
					 The venue is presenting fantastic scenery as all people's ever-deepening reverence for the peerlessly great man is reflected in Kimilsungia.
					
					 Thanks to the warm hearts of all Koreans and progressives following the President forever, Kimilsungia is in full bloom.
					
					 Kimilsungia will shed eternal rays all over the world along with the august name of the great sun.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves to Take Part in Afro-Asia Summit
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves to Take Part in Afro-Asia Summit
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, left here Saturday to take part in the Afro-Asia Summit and events marking of the 60th anniversary of the Afro-Asia Conference (Bundung Conference) and the 10th anniversary of the establishment of new Afro-Asia strategic partnership to be held in Indonesia.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Supreme Court of Russia led by President Vyacheslav Lebedev left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Leave
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia, the general manager of the Dandong, China, Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., and his party, the managing director of the Dandong Jianyuan Commercial Company of China, and his party, and the general manager of the Dandong, China, Tianri Trading Co. Ltd., and his party left here Saturday after taking part in the 17th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 Leaving earlier were Ratna Sari Dewi Sukarno, director of the Dewi Sukarno Office in Japan who doubles as honorary chairperson of the Society for Disseminating and Supporting Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia, and her party,  a delegation of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, China, a delegation of the Dalian City Flower Association of China,  the general manager of the Shenyang, China, Jinwangkai Co. Ltd., of Raw Materials for Chemical Industry, and his party and the vice-president of the Azalea Branch of the China Flower Association.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Renew National Records
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Renew National Records
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Weightlifters of the DPRK renewed national records in several categories at the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest under way in the country.
					 In particular, three weightlifters from the April 25 Sports Team set new records in five categories.
					
					 They include Kim Kwang Song, who proved successful in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championships, the 17th Asian Games, the 2014 World Weightlifting Championships and other international games. He set new national records thrice by lifting one more kilogram in the snatch and three more kilograms in jerk with four more kilograms in total.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Jun of the Pyongyang Sports Team broke the existing record in men's 94kg jerk with lift of one more kilogram.

articles.title: Developers of Light Aircraft Visit Pyongyang
articles.content:
Developers of Light Aircraft Visit Pyongyang
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The scientists, technicians, workers and officials who manufactured light aircraft of Korean style with success visited Pyongyang from April 12 to 17.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un invited to Pyongyang the developers of light aircraft who registered a shining success while glorifying the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by developing the Juche-based air industry.
					
					 Upon their arrival in Pyongyang they were accorded warm welcome by people from all walks of life and school youth and children here.
					
					 The developers of light aircraft visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and made a report to the President and Kim Jong Il that they successfully manufactured light aircraft whose everything is home-made with their own efforts and technology.
					
					 They visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk on Jujak Peak and made bows to her.
					
					 They watched a men's football game of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium in the presence of Kim Jong Un. They enjoyed art performance "Songs Full of Memories" at the People's Theater.
					
					 They visited different parts of Pyongyang.
					
					 They went round the venue of the 17th Kimilsungia Festival which presented spectacular scenery.
					
					 Visiting the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, they deeply grasped once again the immortal feats the President performed by winning the victory in the war and the feats Kim Jong Il performed by leading the Songun revolution.
					
					 They spent pleasant time at the Munsu Water Park, Rungna Dolphinarium, Mirim Riding Club, Rungna People's Pleasure Park and People's Open-air Ice Rink.
					
					 During their stay here they were awarded Order of Kim Jong Il, the highest order of the DPRK, the title of labor hero and other high party and state citations.

articles.title: Scientific Agro-forestry Management in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Agro-forestry Management in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Forestry in the DPRK has directed efforts to putting the agro-forestry management on a scientific basis to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery at an earliest date and raise the utilization rate of forest land.
					 The academy succeeded in putting the creation of mixed forest on a scientific basis.
					
					 It also developed a new method of selecting sites appropriate for agro-forestry management on the basis of satellite image data and geographical information system technology and worked out a nationwide distribution chart of sites.
					
					 And it set up a database for the sites and completed an e-map for agro-forestry management.

articles.title: Famous Lake Yonphung in DPRK
articles.content:
Famous Lake Yonphung in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Lake Yonphung, one of the biggest man-made lakes in the DPRK, is situated between Anju and Kaechon cities.
					 The lake looks like a picture as it is surrounded by hills covered with various species of trees and plants.
					
					 On the top of a hill north of the lake there is a belvedere, and at the shore of the lake there are sanatorium, rest home and pleasure ground as well as a children's camp.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that this large lake was built to supply irrigation water for inhabitants' farming and named it "Lake Yonphung", which means good harvest for every year.
					
					 Thanks to leader Kim Jong Il, a monument to the history of the Phyongnam Irrigation Project was erected at the shore of the lake to convey to posterity the President's feat.
					
					 The lake has become more famous after a holiday camp for scientists was built there under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Mulberry, Silkworm Bred
articles.content:
New Mulberry, Silkworm Bred
Sinuiju, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Sericulture Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science has made valuable research achievements conducive to improving the people's living standard.
					 The silkworm raising research room succeeded in breeding high-yielding mulberry and new variety of mulberry silkworm.
					
					 The leaves of new mulberry are large and very high in quality. They make it possible to harvest mulberry leaves more than 4-5 times in the same area. Eggs of new-bred mulberry silkworm will increase 10 percent and cocoon 15 percent as compared with the preceding species.
					
					 The researchers of the pathology room succeeded in manufacturing preventive medicine for white powder disease of mulberry silkworm. The introduction of the above-said medicine would open a prospect for boosting the cocoon production 30-40 percent.
					
					 Scientists of the institute have made achievements in the project to locally produce disinfectant.

articles.title: Japanese Body Denounces Government's Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Body Denounces Government's Suppression of Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Hiroshima Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship made public a statement on April 1 in denunciation of the Japanese police authorities' suppression of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The statement condemned the police authorities' brigandish suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan as an unprecedented act of violating not only the constitution and criminal procedure code of Japan but also international law. It went on:
					
					 This serious incident in Japan, styling itself a "law-governed state", is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK and the grave infringement upon its sovereignty. The Japanese government is wholly responsible for it.
					
					 The government should apologize to the DPRK and Chongryon for the incident, sternly punish those responsible and stop at once suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 We will, together with broad people protecting justice in Japan and the world, become more vocal denouncing the anachronistic anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon moves of the reactionary forces to drive the Japan-DPRK relations into the worst phase and foster mistrust and antagonism between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Japanese Trade Unions Term Regime Dictatorial One
articles.content:
Japanese Trade Unions Term Regime Dictatorial One
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Japanese trade unions made public statements on April 1 in denunciation of the authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Kinki local headquarters of the All-Japan Construction and Transport Solidarity Trade Union strongly protested against the police authorities' search of the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, adding it was unpardonable. 
					
					 The headquarters called for striving to liquidate the inglorious past, resolve the pending issues and normalize diplomatic relations in accordance with the Pyongyang declaration.
					
					 The Kansai local headquarters of the All-Japan Harbor Trade Union noted the violence by the Abe regime is a reflection of the hostility towards the Korean nation and expressed astonishment at the crudity.
					
					 It condemned the present regime as the political criminal and the dictatorial regime attempting at a war and affirmed full support and solidarity with Chongryon.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Max Thunder
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Max Thunder
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A large-scale joint air combat drill Max Thunder of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers is now being staged in the sky above south Korea.
					 More than 100 aircraft and at least 1 400 troops are involved in the drill to last till April 24 with the purpose of "improving the joint operation capability".
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Max Thunder which has been kicked off, timed to coincide with Foal Eagle, is aimed to carry out the scenario for invading the north.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and the puppet group that are escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The puppet group, obsessed with sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots, is keen to kowtow to its master U.S. and going reckless, backed by him. This will, however, bring it nothing but the most miserable end. 
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces had already served a solemn warning to the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean warmongers dreaming of invading the north that they would sternly punish them through merciless and toughest counteractions.
					
					 Should they finally ignite a war, all service personnel and people of the DPRK will not miss an opportunity but give vent to the pent-up resentment and wipe out the aggressors to the last one.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Their Ruthless Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Their Ruthless Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea on April 18 issued a white paper lashing out at the south Korean puppet conservative group for driving the people's living into dire destitution and ruthlessly violating their elementary right to live. 
					 The white paper laid bare the miserable life of the south Korean people.
					
					 Last year the number of the unemployed was 2.875 million while that of semi-unemployed such as temporary and daily workers receiving low wages who are hired for a day or for several months reached 6.077 million, an all-time high.
					
					 According to data released by the Labor Society Institute of south Korea, there were 18.77 million wage workers as of August last year and 2.27 million of them or 12.1 percent did not receive even the lowest wage. This is an increase of 570,000 workers over that in the same period of 2010.
					
					 When the wage of men's regular workers is considered to be 100 percent, the wage of women's regular workers is 67 percent, that of men's part-time workers 54 percent and that of women's part-time workers 36 percent.
					
					 The vital rights of peasants are being seriously threatened due to the puppet conservative group's sycophancy and treachery and unpopular moves to ruin agriculture.
					
					 The farm land drastically decreased to 1.71 million hectares in 2013 from 2.3 million hectares early in the 1970s, and the population in the countryside dropped to 2.84 million from 14 million in the same period. As a result, the south Korean agriculture is at the crossroads of survival and ruin.
					
					 Foreign surplus agricultural produce is flooding the south Korean market. Consequently, the grain production dwindled 60 percent and the self-sufficiency rate in food sharply dropped 33 percent in the same period. So, one of two inhabitants in south Korea is bound to starve to death unless south Korean depends on grain import from foreign countries.
					
					 The annual average income of the rural households at present is no more than 60 percent of the income of urban households and 40 percent of the former is barely making their ends meet with the lowest living cost. 
					
					 As the house rent is jumping due to the puppet group's policy of speculation of real estate, the number of the poorest without proper shelter is on the increase.
					
					 According to the 2013-2014 survey of housing situation, children living at the underground, dugouts, plastic sheet houses and rooftop houses numbered 1.29 million, young people 1.39 million and old persons aged 65 and above 103,000.
					
					 670,000 persons are living underground in Seoul alone.
					
					 The puppet group's policy of plunder through taxes is seriously threatening the living of the inhabitants.
					
					 According to data released by the "Hanguk Bank", the average debt each resident of south Korea has to pay went beyond 20,000 U.S. dollars.
					
					 Due to the unpopular rule of the south Korean regime and the economic crisis and the deteriorated people's living, all sorts of big accidents such as the ferry Sewol disaster have happened in an unbroken chain.
					
					 The white paper said that south Korea witnesses the worsening social vices caused by the ever-widening gap between the rich and the poor.
					
					 The rich who account for 10 percent of the population hold 48.05 percent of the total income while the low income people who account for 40 percent of the population hold just 2 percent of the total income. 
					
					 The gap between the rich and the poor can be illustrated by the practice "Kapjil," a serious social evil in south Korea these days.
					
					 According to the survey conducted in Jan. this year, 95 percent of the respondents said that such practice is more seriously rampant in south Korea than in any other countries.
					
					 And 58 per cent of the respondents said that politicians, high-ranking officials and tycoons are the very groups which commit such practices in the worst way.
					
					 The middle class is becoming poor and the gap between the rich and the poor is widening and common people are living in despair because of such burdens as taxes, house rent and school fees.
					
					 The white paper also dealt with the fact that the south Korean puppet conservative regime is suppressing south Korean people from all walks of life such as workers and peasants in their actions against the unpopular rule and for the protection of their right to live.
					
					 In July 2013 police brutally suppressed the demonstrators calling for making the part-timers of Hyundai Motors full-timers by firing fire extinguishers and water cannons at them and brandishing shields and iron sticks.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group of conservatives accused more than 190 members of the railway trade union of breach of law and issued warrants of arrest for them after branding the general strike of south Korean railway workers demanding the withdrawal of the plan for the de-nationalization of railways and a halt to the crackdown upon trade unions as an illegal one. Not content with this, the puppet group fired as many as 8 500 workers and brutally cracked down on them by setting in motion fascist repressive machines such as the Ministry of Justice 죵 the Police Agency.
					
					 The puppet group indiscriminately fired water guns at the peasants in their actions against the humiliating moves for flinging the rice market open in June 2014, brutally suppressing the demonstrations.
					
					 The bestial actions of the fascist murderers against the south Korean people demanding the vital rights and democratic rights found a more vivid manifestation in the suppression of actions for peace rally on August 15, 2013 and the actions of peace-loving citizens demanding the probe into truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and punishment of those responsible for it in May 2014.
					
					 The conservative group is working with bloodshot eyes to crack down on the legitimate progressive political parties and organizations aspiring after justice, truth, democracy and reunification.
					
					 In December last year, it perpetrated without hesitation a politically-motivated terrorist act of forcibly disbanding the Unified Progressive Party, a legitimate political party, which had spoken for the oppressed toiling masses including workers and peasants for more than ten years, after branding it as a "political party following the north".
					
					 The miserable plight of the south Korean people will never change as long as the group of traitors are allowed to stay in power.

articles.title: S. Korean Teachers Publish Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
S. Korean Teachers Publish Declaration on Situation
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- More than 17 000 teachers under the Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on April 15, the one year since the ferry Sewol disaster, at which they published a declaration on the situation demanding the abolition of the "enforcement ordinance" related to the special law on the disaster and salvage of the ferry body.
					 In the declaration they said that the truth remains hidden with the ferry still buried in the sea and social reform is being made only to meet the interests of the capital quite contrary to the promise of the present chief executive.
					
					 They said that they would fight it out till they would build the world where man is respected.
					
					 All the teachers will launch actions to salvage the ferry, probe the truth and punish those responsible, they noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Teachers Union said that the teachers would pool their efforts to take the lead in the action to judge the Park regime in case their demand for the abolition of the "enforcement ordinance" and salvage of the ferry is not met.

articles.title: Memorial Rally of Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster, Members of Civic Bodies Held
articles.content:
Memorial Rally of Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster, Members of Civic Bodies Held
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Bereaved families and members of civic organizations of south Korea held a memorial rally at Phaengmok Port, Jindo, South Jolla Province on April 15, one year since the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Speakers said the rally is not a simple one to honor the memory of the victims but a rally demanding the salvage of the ferry to find out nine persons missing and make a proper probe into the truth.
					
					 They demanded the regime scrap the "enforcement ordinance" related to the special law on the ferry, immediately salvage the ferry body and probe the truth.
					
					 In their eulogies they said there are still dead bodies inside the ferry, accusing the regime and the chief executive of being indifferent to the finding out of those missing, salvage of the ferry body, probe into the truth and prevention of the recurrence of similar disaster.

articles.title: Actions against Japan's Distortion of History Staged in U.S.
articles.content:
Actions against Japan's Distortion of History Staged in U.S.
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations in the U.S. are staging actions in protest against Japan's distortion of history.
					 They are conducting a fund-raising campaign to make an ad on the Washington Post on April 29 accusing Japan of distorting history when Japanese Prime Minister Abe is expected to address both Houses of U.S. Congress.
					
					 They said making an ad on the paper would be an important occasion in censuring Japan for persistently denying war crimes against humanity and working hard to revive militarism and thereby pressurizing the Japanese government to admit its responsibility for the past crimes including sexual slavery, make an apology and reparation for them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Various Countries
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held in Russia, Slovakia and Malaysia from April 6 to April 8 on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia said that the career of Kim Il Sung was one of the great revolutionary devoted to the sacred cause of the freedom and liberation of the Korean people. The chairman went on:
					
					 He was the great father of the Korean people who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and turned the DPRK into the single-mindedly united nation. 
					
					 The DPRK emerged an invincible military power under his leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea lauded the Juche idea fathered by the President as the great idea clearly indicating the path for progressive humankind.
					
					 The chairman emphasized that the immortal exploits performed by the President for the Korean and world revolution would shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Syria, Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Syria, Thailand
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Personages of Syria and Thailand issued statements on April 9 and 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, said that April 15 is the Day of the Sun when Kim Il Sung who is always alive in our hearts was born, adding his birth marked a historic event of great significance.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The President made an immortal contribution to the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence. That is why he is always remembered by the Korean people and progressive humankind as the sun of Juche. 
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, and Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, noted:
					
					 The Korean people made sure that Kim Il Sung lies in state at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and hold him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK to convey his sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits to posterity
					
					 With the Day of the Sun the President is always alive in the hearts of humankind as the sun of Juche.

articles.title: Books about Kim Il Sung Republished in Indonesia
articles.content:
Books about Kim Il Sung Republished in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCMA) -- On the occasion of the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 50th anniversary of the naming of a beautiful flower  Kimilsungia "President Soekarno and President Kim Il Sung" and "Evergreen Friendship," the books dedicated to his 100th birth anniversary, were republished in Indonesia.
					 A ceremony of releasing the books took place at Bungkarno University on Apr. 10.
					
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, said that the book "President Soekarno and President Kim Il Sung" deals with the particular relations and friendship between Kim Il Sung and Soekarno and the republished books would make a positive contribution to the development of the Indonesia-DPRK friendly ties.
					
					 The author of the book "Evergreen Friendship" said he came to know well about the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il while visiting the DPRK and pledged himself to write better books about it though he is not a writer.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Praise Exploits of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Praise Exploits of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Cambodia and Germany, photo exhibition in Guinea and film show in Vietnam from Apr. 6 to 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting revolutionary activities of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos introducing the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched a Korean film "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 The vice-chairman of the External Relations Commission of the People's Party of Cambodia warmly congratulated the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President. The People's Party and people of Cambodia will always remember the exploits of the President, he added.
					
					 An organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said that the President performed the undying feats for the country and its people and he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressives as the father of all people and the sun of humankind.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea noted that the progressive people recollected with deep emotion the exploits of the President on the occasion of the auspicious Day of the Sun. He paid highest tribute to the President who made a great contribution to accomplishing the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Peru
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in Lima, Peru on April 9 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, elaborated that the President indicated the road of the world progressive parties and people in their struggle for independence against imperialism and for progress and prosperity and led the human cause of independence to victory.
					
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", said that the President achieved the historic cause of national liberation, founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK and devoted himself to the reunification of the country and unity of the nation all his life.
					
					 Eleazar Ramos Loarte, secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism, noted that the President was the genius of idea and theory and the great master of leadership who founded the immortal Juche idea and led the Korean revolution to victory by enlisting the strength of the popular masses.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, emphasized that supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un is leading the DPRK to victory true to the last instructions of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Austrian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Austrian Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on April 12.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101(2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits achieved by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and preserving their ideas and exploits and eternally glorifying them.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita 55o aniversario de fundacion de SWAPO de Namibia
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita 55o aniversario de fundacion de SWAPO de Namibia
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al Comite Central de la Organizacion Popular de Africa Sudoccidental (SWAPO) de Namibia, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la fundacion de este partido.
					La misiva expresa el regocijo por muchos exitos alcanzados por la SWAPO durante 55 anos pasados despues de su fundacion en la lucha por lograr la independencia del pais y construir nueva Namibia estable y desarrollada. 
					
					Expone la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises y desea mayores exitos en el futuro trabajo de SWAPO por consolidar el partido y lograr el desarrollo socio-economico del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, Robert G. Mugabe, con motivo del 35o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano. 
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises continuaran desarrollandose y fortaleciendose en varios dominios, el remitente desea de todo corazon mayores exitos en el trabajo del mandatario y del pueblo de Zimbabwe por el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Delegacion de RPDC parte para Cumbre Asia -Africa
articles.content:
Delegacion de RPDC parte para Cumbre Asia -Africa
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, partio este sabado de esta capital para tomar parte en la Cumbre Afro-Asiatica y en el acto conmemorativo del 60o aniversario de la Conferencia de Bandung y del 10o del establecimiento de las nuevas relaciones de acompanantes estrategicos de Asia y Africa, que tendran lugar en Indonesia.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena ejercicios aereos "Max Thunder" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena ejercicios aereos "Max Thunder" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Ahora se desarrollan en el cielo surcoreano los ejercicios combinados de combate aereo "Max Thunder" bajo el pretexto de "mejoramiento de la capacidad de operacion conjunta". 
					En esta maniobra, que tendra lugar hasta el dia 24, participan mas de 100 aviones y mas de mil 400 efectivos de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea.
					
					El desarrollo simultaneo de "Max Thunder" y "Foal Eagle" persigue evidentemente el cumplimento de la ambicion de agredir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 18 y continua:
					
					Los que agudizan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana son EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Seran arruinados tragicamente si los titeres surcoreanos continuan lanzando la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida adulando a su amo gringo.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC declararon ya al interior y exterior que castigaran rotundamente con las medidas intransigentes a los agresores norteamericanos y los belicistas surcoreanos que suenan con agredir al Norte de Corea.
					
					Si esas fuerzas hostiles escogen la guerra, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC no perderan jamas esa oportunidad para exterminar a los agresores.
